label: Supp Brass Inst: Euph/Tuba
description: Class instruction in the fundamentals of playing and teaching the euphonium and tuba. Acquire knowledge on recommended instruments and equipment, maintenance procedures, and training materials. Prerequisite: Intended for music majors in the BME instrumental concentration.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Intended for music majors in the BME instrumental concentration.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to BME:Music Education -UIUC, BME:MusEd:Instrmntl Music-UIUC, or BME:Mus Ed:Elem Gen Music-UIUC.
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
